div.p: Senior MacBook Buyout: Important Reset Instructions are below in "Recent News".
List of Wi-Fi Hot Spots and internet access locations can be found below in "Recent News".
LLS is closed for the remainder of the School Year. Please go to LLS Remote Learning tab for tools to help your child complete assignments from home.
LLS will be serving FREE breakfast & lunch during the school closure. Meal sites are below in "Recent News".

p.span: Los Lunas Schools, home to 15 schools and approximately 8,500 students, prides itself on an individualized and personalized approach to educating its students. Classes of instruction are relatively small; student support services are strong; and the curricular and co-curricular programs are diverse. The pursuit of academic excellence in this district reflects the deep belief that all students can learn and that all students deserve high quality instruction in the classroom. It also means that there are high academic expectations in terms of the basic literacies. The educational program is geared to encourage critical thinking and a love of learning.

em.span: Every Student Matters. Every Moment Counts

p.span: Los Lunas Schools will be the premier school district in the State of New Mexico by exemplifying high levels of learning for all students.

Preparing, empowering, and inspiring all students to reach
their maximum potential.
